meanings.sent1: The birds flew high in the welkins.
meanings.sent2: The stars twinkled in the welkins at night.
meanings.sent3: The airplane soared through the welkins with ease.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds covered the welkins, hiding the sun.
meanings.sent5: The welkins were painted in shades of pink and orange during the sunset.

meanings.sent1: The welkins echoed with the sound of thunder.
meanings.sent2: The welkins resounded with the cheers of the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The welkins seemed to protest with a loud welkin of noise.
meanings.sent4: The welkins roared with the fury of the storm.
meanings.sent5: The welkins rang with the joyful welkin of church bells.
